title: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
description: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps, accessing a URL results in a response with HTTP code 200 OK but no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps, accessing a URL should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download and extract the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps.
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance.
4. Observe the response and verify that it returns HTTP error 404 instead of HTTP code 200 OK.
